  • getConsent(source:origin:)
Instance Method

getConsent(source:origin:)

Gets latest consent given for a source and origin.

Declaration

func getConsent(source: String, origin: String? = nil) async throws -> TikiSdkConsent

Return Value

Latest TikiSdkConsent for source and origin.

Discussion

It does not validate if the consent is expired or if it can be applied to a specific destination. For that, applyConsent should be used instead. If no origin is specified, it uses the default origin.

  • Parameters

    • source: The identification of the data source.

    • destination: TikiSdkDestination.

    • origin: Optional override for default origin.

Note

TikiSdkError
